ccre.chan

Class BooleanStatus

  • java.lang.Object
    • ccre.chan.BooleanStatus
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BooleanInput, BooleanInputPoll, BooleanInputProducer, BooleanOutput

    public class BooleanStatus
extends java.lang.Object
implements BooleanOutput, BooleanInput
    A virtual node that is both a BooleanOutput and a BooleanInput. You can modify its value, read its value, and subscribe to changes in its value. BooleanStatus also provides a number of useful helper functions.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected CArrayList<BooleanOutput> consumers
      The list of all the BooleanOutputs to modify when this BooleanStatus changes value.
      protected EventConsumer setFalse
      The cached EventConsumer that sets the current value to false.
      protected EventConsumer setTrue
      The cached EventConsumer that sets the current value to true.
      protected EventConsumer toggle
      The cached EventConsumer that toggles the current value.
      protected boolean value
      The current state (true or false) of this BooleanStatus.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      BooleanStatus()
      Create a new BooleanStatus.
      BooleanStatus(BooleanOutput... targets)
      Create a new BooleanStatus that automatically updates all of the specified BooleanOutputs with the current state of this BooleanStatus.
      BooleanStatus(BooleanOutput target)
      Create a new BooleanStatus that automatically updates the specified BooleanOutput with the current state of this BooleanStatus.

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Subscribe to changes in this boolean input's value.

      Get an EventConsumer that, when fired, will set the state to false.

      Get an EventConsumer that, when fired, will set the state to true.
      EventConsumer getToggleEvent()
      Get an EventConsumer that, when fired, will toggle the state.

      Get the current state of this boolean input.
      boolean removeTarget(BooleanOutput consum)
      Unsubscribe from changes in this boolean input's value.

      When the specified event occurs, set the status to false.

      When the specified event occurs, set the status to true.
      void toggleWhen(EventSource event)
      When the specified event occurs, toggle the status.

      Set the boolean value of this output.

    • Field Detail

      • value

        protected boolean value
        The current state (true or false) of this BooleanStatus. Do not directly modify this field. Use the writeValue method instead.
        See Also:
        writeValue(boolean)

      • consumers

        protected CArrayList<BooleanOutput> consumers
        The list of all the BooleanOutputs to modify when this BooleanStatus changes value.
        See Also:
        addTarget(ccre.chan.BooleanOutput), removeTarget(ccre.chan.BooleanOutput)

      • setTrue

        protected EventConsumer setTrue
        The cached EventConsumer that sets the current value to true. Use getSetTrueEvent() instead, because this might be null.
        See Also:
        getSetTrueEvent()

      • setFalse

        protected EventConsumer setFalse
        The cached EventConsumer that sets the current value to false. Use getSetFalseEvent() instead, because this might be null.
        See Also:
        getSetFalseEvent()

      • toggle

        protected EventConsumer toggle
        The cached EventConsumer that toggles the current value. Use getToggleEvent() instead, because this might be null.
        See Also:
        getToggleEvent()

    • Constructor Detail

      • BooleanStatus

        public BooleanStatus()
        Create a new BooleanStatus.

      • BooleanStatus

        public BooleanStatus(BooleanOutput target)
        Create a new BooleanStatus that automatically updates the specified BooleanOutput with the current state of this BooleanStatus. This is the same as creating a new BooleanStatus and then adding the BooleanOutput as a target.
        Parameters:
        target - The BooleanOutput to automatically update.
        See Also:
        addTarget(ccre.chan.BooleanOutput)

      • BooleanStatus

        public BooleanStatus(BooleanOutput... targets)
        Create a new BooleanStatus that automatically updates all of the specified BooleanOutputs with the current state of this BooleanStatus. This is the same as creating a new BooleanStatus and then adding all of the BooleanOutputs as targets.
        Parameters:
        targets - The BooleanOutputs to automatically update.
        See Also:
        addTarget(ccre.chan.BooleanOutput)

      • writeValue

        public void writeValue(boolean value)
        Description copied from interface: BooleanOutput
        Set the boolean value of this output. In other words, turn it on or off.
        Specified by:
        writeValue in interface BooleanOutput
        Parameters:
        value - The new value to send to this output.

      • readValue

        public boolean readValue()
        Description copied from interface: BooleanInputPoll
        Get the current state of this boolean input.
        Specified by:
        readValue in interface BooleanInputPoll
        Returns:
        The current value.

      • addTarget

        public void addTarget(BooleanOutput csm)
        Description copied from interface: BooleanInputProducer
        Subscribe to changes in this boolean input's value. The boolean output will be modified whenever the value of this input changes.
        Specified by:
        addTarget in interface BooleanInputProducer
        Parameters:
        csm - The boolean output to notify when the value changes.
        See Also:
        BooleanOutput.writeValue(boolean), BooleanInputProducer.removeTarget(ccre.chan.BooleanOutput)

      • removeTarget

        public boolean removeTarget(BooleanOutput consum)
        Description copied from interface: BooleanInputProducer
        Unsubscribe from changes in this boolean input's value. This reverses the actions of a previous addTarget call.
        Specified by:
        removeTarget in interface BooleanInputProducer
        Parameters:
        consum - The output to unsubscribe.
        Returns:
        Whether the output was actually subscribed.
        See Also:
        BooleanInputProducer.addTarget(ccre.chan.BooleanOutput)
